Package Core2D.Core2D

Class Core2D

java.lang.Object
Core2D.Graphics.Graphics
Core2D.Core2D.Core2D
public class Core2D extends Graphics
Core2D. Extends Graphics class. Responsible for starting the application or game.
See Also:
  • Graphics

  • Field Details

    • core2DUserCallback

      public static Core2DUserCallback core2DUserCallback
      Core2D use callback. Defines the methods onInit(), onExit(), onDrawFrame(), onDeltaUpdate(...).

  • Method Details

    • start

      public static void start()
      Starts Core2D.

    • start

      public static void start(String windowName)
      Starts Core2D.
      Parameters:
      windowName - The name of the window that will be created when Core2D is launched.

    • start

      public static void start(String windowName, org.joml.Vector2i windowSize)
      Starts Core2D.
      Parameters:
      windowName - The name of the window that will be created when Core2D is launched.
      windowSize - The size of the window that will be created when Core2D is launched.

    • start

      public static void start(String windowName, int[] windowHintsNames, int[] windowHintsValues)
      Starts Core2D. Warning! Length of windowHintsNames must be == length of windowHintsValues.
      Parameters:
      windowName - The name of the window that will be created when Core2D is launched.
      windowHintsNames - Names of hints to launch the window.
      windowHintsValues - Values of hints to launch the window.

    • start

      public static void start(String windowName, org.joml.Vector2i windowSize, int[] windowHintsNames, int[] windowHintsValues)
      Starts Core2D. Warning! Length of windowHintsNames must be == length of windowHintsValues.
      Parameters:
      windowName - The name of the window that will be created when Core2D is launched.
      windowSize - The size of the window that will be created when Core2D is launched.
      windowHintsNames - Names of hints to launch the window.
      windowHintsValues - Values of hints to launch the window.

    • stopCore2D

      public static void stopCore2D()
      Stops Core2D. Calls the onExit() method in the core2DUserCallback.

      public static Window getWindow()
